Description:
Under Offer/Under Contract
Here's one for developers, investors and first home buyers! Recently renovated with a fresh coat of paint and polished timber floors, this conveniently located home offers spacious living on a large 851m2 allotment. The light and airy interior features a generous lounge/dining with garden views, functional kitchen/meals with fresh cabinetry, 3 good-sized carpeted bedrooms (2 with built-in robes), bright family bathroom and large laundry. The covered alfresco area overlooks spacious low maintenance gardens complete with garden shed and citrus trees - the perfect setting for relaxed outdoor entertaining. Additional features include ducted heating and a double carport with access to the rear garden. With such a substantial block and convenient location, there is development potential (STCA). With access via a service lane, only a few doors from the popular Merrindale shopping precinct, the Dandenong Ranges on your doorstep and easy access to the city, this home offers a world of possibilities. Be quick, arrange an inspection today!

Description:
POTENTIAL & POSITION
Located in a quiet but convenient location with established gardens and positioned perfectly with a short walk to the Eastfield shops, Tarralla Creek Trail, Pinjarra Kindergarten and Eastfield Park, this family home is situated on a full block of 865m2 (approx.). Opportunities abound - the decision is yours - renovate, rebuild or subdivide (STCA). Featuring 3 good size bedrooms, study, 2 bathrooms, family room, heating and cooling, large backyard with rear private deck & front covered verandah. Also included is space for extra car parking with two driveways, a single garage with rear access, single carport and separate workshop suitable for a tradesperson, home business or just somewhere to put the caravan or trailer.
Call today to arrange an inspection. Terms: 10% Dep, Bal 30/60 Days

Address: 17 Woodland Park Rise CROYDON SOUTH VIC 3136
Description:
Upsize to Young Family Quality
Families looking to upsize will love the space, style and 4-car accommodation offered by this beautiful 2-storey BV family retreat. This stunning 12-year young home is set on a full corner block of about 654 sqm., in a quality estate, and boasts dual access for your vehicles. A Palladian window and magnificent views of the Dandenongs create impact, while the light interior is superbly styled with contemporary decor. The generous layout features 4 double bedrooms (robed) plus a study. Servicing these is a family bathroom and powder room.
Parents have a huge master suite, complete with sitting area, WIR, ensuite and amazing views. Three big zoned living areas and a gourmet kitchen showcasing s/s appliances and excellent storage invite relaxed family living and entertaining. Discover a formal lounge and formal dining room accentuated by a bay window, as well as a vast sun-filled family/meals room. Upstairs you can relish the 'wow-factor' views from the large rumpus/sitting room, which is a perfect space for children/teens. The paved entertaining area (enhanced by shade sails and water feature), decking and gorgeous landscaped garden will appeal to adults and children alike. The handyperson has 2 double garages; one has internal access and remote; one could be a workshop. Appointments: GDH, evaporative cooling and under-stair storage.
Ideally located; close to transport, shops, Tinternvale Primary, Tintern Girls Grammar, kinder, reserves and EastLink. Ready to enjoy!
Angelique Rita : 0421 319 516

Description:
Stunning Lifestyle, without Compromise
You'll enjoy space, quality and all the mod cons in this young single level brick veneer sanctuary. This stylishly rendered home is set in a quality estate and will suit busy families, retirees, professionals or investors desiring a spacious, low-maintenance design. The beautiful, sun-kissed interior is accentuated by high ceilings and contemporary decor. Three double bedrooms (BIRs), a versatile open study and a family bathroom will make life easy. The huge private master has space for a sofa and features WIR, cooling and ensuite. For effortless living and entertaining enjoy a big formal lounge and dining room, and a large gourmet kitchen fitted with quality appliances and walk-in pantry. The vast family/meals room opens to an elevated entertainer's deck, with stunning views of the Dandenongs. A covered barbeque area and pretty, easy-care landscaped garden also inspire easy outdoor living. Superbly appointed: internal access remote double garage, ducted heating, split system air-conditioning, ducted vacuum, solar hot water, solar electricity, water storage (under deck) and electric roller shutters. A premier location; walk to bus, kinder and shops; close to Tintern Grammar, reserves and EastLink. Enquire now!

Description:
Relaxed Family Appeal or Subdivide (STCA)
Developers, Investors and Young Families will be drawn to this stylishly rendered retreat. This attractive home is set on about 864 sqm, and gives you fantastic potential to subdivide. (STCA). Enjoy effortless living now, or rent it out for a great return while you get your plans and permits. Eye-catching landscaped gardens create impact, while the fashionable, sun-kissed interior features hardwood floorboards and quality window furnishings. Discover an elegant lounge room for casual living, and a smart kitchen/meals area with backyard views and a Chef oven. Three double bedrooms (2 with BIRs) are serviced by a plush renovated bathroom. The renovated laundry has ample built-in storage. Outdoors is just as fabulous - a gazebo invites relaxed entertaining, and the children can play safely in the huge flat landscaped backyard. For the handyperson, a big powered workshop and a bungalow/storage will delight. Plus, excellent access and plenty of space to extend (STCA). Extras: gas heating, air-conditioning, new flyscreens, new window locks and 2-car tandem carport. A sought-after location walk to bus, Merrindale shops, Belmont Park and Croydon Special Developmental School. Close to Dorset Primary and EastLink. Don't miss it!

Description:
An Inviting Feel With Single-Level Appeal
Relaxed poolside living can be yours & your family's to enjoy in this immaculate single-level home. Enjoying polished floorboards, the four-bedroom, two-bathroom home has the look for today. Centred around a sparkling kitchen, the layout features a formal living and dining room opening to a veranda at the front and an outdoor entertaining deck at the rear. The separate family room, where kids can play with their friends & watch TV, also has an easy transition to the alfresco area that wraps around to the side and overlooks the in-ground pool. The sleeping quarters are neatly arranged along the left of the entry. The master bedroom has a walk-in robe and ensuite bathroom. A double garage, laundry, return driveway and a handy storeroom complete the scenario. Conveniently close to primary and high schools, train stations, parks and shops, this is just the home that you and your family have been looking for.
LAND: 1006 sqm (approx.)

Description:
Family Prospects - Tintern Address
With its spacious layout and idyllic address in the Tintern precinct, this beautifully presented 4 bedroom 2 bathroom retreat will attract Young Families, Renovators or Investors. This comfortable home is only a short walk from Tintern Grammar School and Tinternvale Primary School, and offers you fantastic scope to modernise and capitalise over time if you wish. A lush landscaped garden exudes street appeal, while the spacious split-level floor plan will cater to your family's needs. Discover 4 double bedrooms (3 with BIRs) and a neat family bathroom. The private master features his/hers BIRs, ensuite and garden access. Three living areas will make life easy. Enjoy the garden views from the large lounge/dining room, or entertain beside the wood fire heater in the big family/rumpus room it also boasts a built-in bar and storage. The open plan kitchen/meals area has a dishwasher and wall oven. You'll also find a private paved area for your barbeques and an easy-care landscaped garden for children to play. Extras: wood fire heater, reverse cycle air-conditioning, shed/workshop, excellent off street parking for caravan/cars/trailer and double carport (storage). Walk to shops, transport, schools and reserves. A must-see! Call Sales Agent Sharyn de Vries 0401 031 802 for my details.

Description:
Looking for a Fresh & Stylish First Home?
One look at the fashionably styled interior and gorgeous outdoor area of this beautifully presented BV home, and you'll fall in love. It's set in a tranquil no-through road in the popular Gateway Estate, and is perfect for Young Families or First Homebuyers. A large landscaped front garden, accentuated by a high picket fence and riverstones, creates stunning visual appeal, and is a useable space for children, or to park your caravan or vehicles. Inside is freshly painted, boasts contemporary window furnishings and has recently had new carpets, new floating floors and new ducted heating. Discover a modern kitchen fitted with quality appliances, including dishwasher and s/s oven. Enjoy two living areas - a large family/meals room with doors to the alfresco, and a stylish lounge room, which could be a dining area if you wish. Three bedrooms (BIRs) are serviced by a lovely spa bath bathroom, while the master suite boasts an ensuite. Two outdoor living areas ensure effortless entertaining. Relax on the covered merbau deck, or enjoy barbeques in the big paved alfresco area, which is roofed for 'all-seasons' use. With only two owners, this pristine, light-filled home is made perfect with a private, low-maintenance landscaped garden, GDH, evaporative cooling, shed, external blinds (at front), double carport and excellent off street parking and rear access for vehicles. Close to Merrindale shops, transport, Dorset Primary, kinder, parks and EastLink. Act now!
Donna Walpole : 0421 997 827

Description:
Under Offer/Under Contract
Starting an investment portfolio? Entering the market for the first time? Then you must add this to your list. Located in a quiet, tree-lined street this sturdy brick veneer home has freshly polished wooden floors throughout the 3 bedrooms (2 with built-in robes) and spacious lounge. Providing low maintenance living on all fronts, the bright, airy interior also includes a kitchen/meals area, central family bathroom and laundry with external access. To complete the package the low maintenance garden features a garden shed for that all important storage, paving at the rear of the house, and pretty established shrubs. Also featuring air conditioner and gas heating, electronic shutters on front of house to keep you cool in summer and warm in winter, plus security doors for added peace of mind. Just around the corner from the popular Eastfield shops and with the Tarralla Creek bike and walking trail at the end of the street - you will be right at home.

Simply Put Your Feet Up & Enjoy
OFFERS CLOSING 5pm Tuesday 5th February (unless sold prior)
Retirees, Investors or First Homebuyers, you'll discover stylish, fuss-free living and location convenience in this beautifully presented brick veneer home. This smart home is set in the popular Gateway Estate and is ready for you to enjoy. Stunning landscaped gardens produce a vibrant splash of colour, while the freshly painted, sun-kissed interior is styled for effortless living with contemporary carpets. Imagine the ease of a sparkling new gourmet kitchen. It's only a year young, and is fitted with state of the art quality stainless steel appliances and excellent storage. Relax in style with the spacious lounge/dining room, which has a ceiling fan and new light fittings. Three robed bedrooms are serviced by a walk-thru bathroom and separate walk-thru toilet. The large master suite has walk in robe, ceiling fan and split-system air-conditioning. Enjoy all year round relaxation and entertaining in the covered alfresco area. It overlooks a newly refreshed easy-care landscaped garden, boasting a fish pond and vegie patch. Appointments: gas heating, external blinds (at front), off street parking and large remote double lock-up garage with space for a workshop and storage. Walk to Merrindale Shops, bus and parks; close to EastLink. Enquire now!

Description:
Under Offer/Under Contract
Step right up! This is a top opportunity to buy your first home or to start building your investment portfolio. This brick veneer family home is well positioned and offers comfort and convenience in equal measures. Ideally located at the end of a quiet street with parklands and walking trails on your doorstep, this property is close to local transport, shops, sporting clubs and other local amenities. Accommodation includes 3 robed bedrooms (main with built-in robes and access to 2-way bathroom), neutral kitchen/meals with gas cooking, new countertops, dishwasher, and pantry, spacious lounge/dining, bathroom, separate WC and laundry. Plenty of room outside for play in low-maintenance gardens, plus covered patio area. Additional features include wall heater, ceiling fans, garden shed and double carport. Make your move before it's too late, inspect today!

Description:
Hidden Surprise!
We've found it! Situated in a tranquil, tree-lined street within a tightly-held pocket of Croydon South, this warm and embracing home is a choice property for first-home buyers and investors.
Featuring a smart, family-friendly floor plan, the comfortable lounge room is appointed with a gas wall heater and split system air-conditioning, flowing through to a second living zone incorporating a functional kitchen comprising gas hot plates, electric wall oven and adjacent meals/family area.
Cascading outside through a glass door, you'll find a paved BBQ area overlooking a large backyard, making this home ideal for those who love spending time outdoors - secure for children and pets.
All bedrooms are robed and feature polished floorboards (perfect for allergy sufferers), including the master which boasts an en-suite-effect bathroom with separate bath and shower.
Furthermore, the home includes additional benefits like; garden shed, double carport and additional off-street parking.
Nestled in a no-thru road and surrounded by serene parklands, this delightful residence is within walking distance to schools, shops and public transport. This is your chance to live the Australian dream.
James Brougham : 0412 620 498

Description:
SOLD BEFORE CLOSING DATE
CLOSING DATE SALE
(UNLESS SOLD PRIOR)
Tuesday 12th February 2013 at 6.00pm
Located in the highly sought after Gateway Estate and only minutes' walk to public transport and a number of playgrounds, is this beautifully maintained 3 bedroom home awaiting your inspection.
Boasting open plan living and meals area with split system air conditioning, ducted heating throughout, full bathroom with heated towel racks and full laundry with ample cupboard space. All of this finished off with brand new carpet and a fresh coat of paint.
Budding chefs will feel at ease in the kitchen with gas stove top and stainless steel appliances, including under bench oven, range hood and dishwasher.
Two out of the 3 bedrooms are fitted with BIRs and ceiling fans to provide a comfortable sleep at night.
Handymen will love the large shed and rear access through the double carport which is perfect for parking a boat or trailer off the street.
Comprising style, low maintenance living and an excellent location this is a must see!
Book your inspection today.
At Biggin & Scott Knox - We Deliver

Description:
Make the Switch to Effortless Living
Do you desire a stylish and inviting home that offers you effortless living without the maintenance? Whether you're a Downsizer, Investor or First Homebuyer, this smart home, set on a low-maintenance block, will provide immediate enjoyment as well as location convenience. Colonial-style windows and a striking landscaped garden create beautiful street appeal. Indoors, splashes of natural light and modern dcor set the scene for an easy lifestyle. Enjoy the functionality and style of the large open plan kitchen; it's fitted with quality appliances, excellent storage and a brand new dishwasher. Relax or entertain friends beside the open fireplace in the chic comfort of the formal lounge room. A spacious family/meals area is also a feel-good space. Discover 3 bedrooms (robed), and a big walk-thru spa bath bathroom. The private master suite has a walk in robe. The laundry has access to an undercover area; handy for drying clothes. You won't have a care in the world as you unwind in the privacy of the gorgeous courtyard-style landscaped garden. Appointments: secure internal access remote double garage (space for a workshop), ducted heating, evaporative cooling and shed. Walk to Eastfield Mall, bus, kinder and Tinternvale Primary. A must-see!
